title: Ecuador Sells Record $4 Billion in Post-Restructuring Bond Deal
description: Ecuador sold $4 billion of bonds, its largest-ever issuance as it returned to global credit markets after restructuring its debt in 2020.
content: Ecuador sold $4 billion of bonds, its largest-ever issuance as it returned to global credit markets after restructuring its debt in 2020.
